outer_radial_option.description: Skip giving any more orders to units and just go straight to the next turn.
outer_radial_option.strategy_tip: Any units without orders will automatically perform a Gather.

outer_radial_option.description: Lenses can be further customized, with elements turned on or off.
outer_radial_option.strategy_tip: Each lens has its own separate set of options.

outer_radial_option.display_name: Take All Units Out Of Standby
outer_radial_option.description: If some of your units are in standby mode, bring them all out of that mode.
outer_radial_option.strategy_tip: To put some of them back into standby mode, you'll need to review each one individually and use the ability bar to do so.
